toc.value: How to create your own snippets?

frontMatter.title: What are Snippets in VSCode?
frontMatter.summary: Code snippets are templates that make it easier to enter repeating code patterns, such as loops or conditional-statements.

prev.title: Removing sensitive data from the git history
prev.summary: Its a bad practice to keep sensitive data like password in your repository. How can I remove that from previous commits (git history)?
